title: CHICKEN FRIDE RICE
full_tiltle: CHICKEN FRIDE RICE - SMALL - RICE VARIETIES - Foodie GRAND
description:
Bring your favorite kottu from foodie Restaurant to your doorstep via Kapruka now.
It is now possible to celebrate/gift your loved ones` special days with Mr. Kottu that are produced in a safe manner using high-quality ingredients. You can choose from a variety of kottu, rice, and burgers from foodie Restaurant according to your taste.

title: CHICKEN DUM POT BIRIYANI
full_tiltle: CHICKEN DUM POT BIRIYANI - POT FOR 4 ADULTS
description:
Biriyani rice with Masala Chicken, Fried Chickn Raitha, Green Pea Curry Maldive Fish Sambol
About Pot Biriyani
POT Biriyani has come a long way in serving the traditional Biriyani in a POT, to our very own Kottu and String hopper Biriyani, and much much more to choose from a wide variety dished out in our menu. The fusion flavored home cooked POT Biriyani is a must. We bring you the best of flavor and culture

Pot Biriyani is a small home cookery which specializes in biriyani. Chicken, mutton, prawn, veg. It`s takeaway or delivery and it`s meant for groups - eight people by default. As the name implies, everything comes in clay pots. You get the usual biriyani pot, kottu pot, pittu baabath pot, even dessert pot.

title: SINGAPORE STYLE NOODLES
full_tiltle: SINGAPORE STYLE NOODLES- SMALL - NOODLES - JASMINE SONG
description:
Flower Drum Restaurant has rebranded itself as `Jasmine Song`. Jasmine Song instantly established a reputable name for itself when it opened its doors in 2014. Jasmine Song, now in its fifth year in Colombo and Moratuwa, has a strong customer base, and it considered the leading Chinese restaurant in Colombo. dine at Jasmine Song and experience Chinese cuisine at its finest, where the Flower Drum culture has remained unchanged.
Small is enough for 2 persons.

title: HOT BUTTER CUTTLEFISH
full_tiltle: HOT BUTTER CUTTLEFISH - RED ORCHID
description: Enjoying a relaxed, convivial atmosphere Red Orchids Chinese and Thai restaurant in Colombo puts a uniquely modern twist on the alluring flavors of Authentic Chinese and Thai Cuisine with a delicious contemporary touch. Passionate about retaining the true spirit of traditional Chinese and Thai Cuisine, Red Orchids the freshest of produce and the finest seasonal ingredients which are translated into delicious daily creations.

title: BEEF BURGER MEAL
full_tiltle: BEEF BURGER MEAL- REGULAR - BURGERKING
description: `BURGER KING` is the world`s second largest hamburger chain tracking records of serving over 11 million guests per day across 91 nations. Most of BURGER KING`s® restaurants are owned and operated by independent franchisees with strong business presence in-country. The restaurants feature Burger King`s signature flame-grilled Whopper, chicken and other specialty sandwiches with an extra flavor of spice to satisfy the Asian tongue along with french fries, soft drinks and desserts.

title: SUBMARINE PLATTER
full_tiltle: SUBMARINE PLATTER - VEG SMALL - PAANPAAN
description:
A fresh, healthy Submarine Portions filled with Cheese and Tomatoes in Soft White Bread, Brown Multi seed Bread. Each Submarine is dressed with lettuce, green cucumber, onions with an unique Paan Paan Sauce.

Large Platter includes 30 pieces and each submarine portion is 3` long. - Sufficient for about 12-15 Servings

Small Platter includes 15 Pieces and each Submarine portion is 3 ` long - Sufficient for about 6-8 Servings
